xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.7 Hetuduka, Pītittika » 1.7.3 Upekkhāsahagatapada » 1.7.3.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Pītittika
Upekkhāsahagatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
254.
509Hetu upekkhāsahagato dhammo hetussa upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
510Hetu upekkhāsahagato dhammo hetussa upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  nava.
511Hetu upekkhāsahagato dhammo hetussa upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo…  nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
255.
512Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
